definition: scene/spectacle/occasion/situation
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to keep up appearances/to put up a front

sentences.english: The"Madding Crowd"conceals the deep sense of illusion and absurdity.
sentences.chinese: 熱鬧喧囂的場面下，蘊涵着濃重的虛幻感和荒誕意識。

sentences.english: Operators want the most exciting scenes of the small feeding of goldfish .
sentences.chinese: 最爲精彩的要算小金魚喫食的場面了。

sentences.english: Battles between these mega carnivores must have been quite a spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 這些大傢伙之間的爭鬥場面肯定相當壯觀。

sentences.english: I'm sure you've seen what cats do when they see a strange dog.
sentences.chinese: 我相信你看過貓在敵逢陌生狗時的應急場面。

sentences.english: The violent scenes filled the audience with revulsion.
sentences.chinese: 這些暴力的場面使觀衆很反感。

sentences.english: When it comes to face the real action . He is useless.
sentences.chinese: 一旦面對真正的場面時，他就沒輙了。

sentences.english: The electric and magnetic field shows the similar distribution on a plane in the far field.
sentences.chinese: 任何電流源遠場面上之電場與磁場呈現相似之分佈。

sentences.english: Luckily the strength of the piece did not depend upon him.
sentences.chinese: 幸好這齣戲並不靠他來撐場面。

sentences.english: No words can express the grandeur of that parade.
sentences.chinese: 閱兵式那宏偉的場面是無法用語言來表達的。

sentences.english: A bridge alone, a person alone, it is demonstrating the quiet isolation.
sentences.chinese: 孤橋一座，獨人一個，表現出一種很冷清的場面。

sentences.english: The opening ceremony was a fine spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 開幕式典禮是個壯觀的場面。

sentences.english: The scene horripilated her to death.
Movie-goers can expect to see magnificent battle scenes in the upcoming film.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆將會在即將上映的電影看到壯觀戰鬥場面。

sentences.english: The balance of play evened out rather more.
sentences.chinese: 這樣比賽的場面變得均衡多了。

sentences.english: Jake stares at the strange and wild alien tableau.
sentences.chinese: 傑克凝視着這個外星球的奇怪而充滿野性的動人場面。

sentences.english: Scene changed to Ishida and Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 場面轉到雨龍和阿波羅。
